Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Select a costume for Sonic to wear.

Elements.Name: alwaysActiveReticle
Description: Enable this to make the homing reticle active at all times, just like Sonic Frontiers.

Elements.Name: doubleJump
Description: Enable this to allow Sonic to double jump where available.
This cannot be used with the Double Jump mod.

Elements.Name: groundHoming
Description: Enable this to allow Sonic to homing attack whilst grounded.
It is highly recommended to use this with Remap Homing Attack on X enabled.

Elements.Name: stompBounce
Description: Enable this to allow Sonic to bounce when holding B after stomping.

Elements.Name: dropDashType
Description: Determines how Sonic can perform the drop dash.

Elements.Name: spinAttackRollDuration
Description: Determines how long Sonic will remain in a ball after rolling.

Elements.Name: dropDashVelocitySideView
Description: Determines how fast Sonic will be propelled when performing a drop dash in 2D.

Elements.Name: dropDashVelocityForwardView
Description: Determines how fast Sonic will be propelled when performing a drop dash in 3D.

Elements.Name: doubleJumpVelocity
Description: Determines how high Sonic will double jump.

Elements.Name: doubleJumpVelocityWater
Description: Determines how high Sonic will double jump underwater.

Elements.Name: stompBounceCount
Description: Determines how many times Sonic can bounce.
This limit can be disabled with a value of -1.

Elements.Name: stompBounceDelay
Description: Determines how long the B button must be held for Sonic to bounce.

Elements.Name: stompBounceVelocity
Description: Determines how high Sonic will bounce.

Elements.Name: stompBounceVelocityWater
Description: Determines how high Sonic will bounce underwater.

Elements.Name: homingOnX
Description: This cannot be used with the Homing Attack on Boost code.

Elements.Name: lightDashOnLS
Elements.DisplayName: Remap Light Dash to Left Stick

Description: Drop Dash will be disabled.
Drop Dash will only be usable in 2D.
Drop Dash will only be usable in 3D.
Drop Dash will be usable in both 2D and 3D.
